top10_tweets_like: Y'ALL. Making maps with #rstats and {sf} (even fictional maps!) is absurdly easy. Behold, Middle Earth in 26 lines of code! (code here: https://t.co/lC3ArRt4RC) https://t.co/SCrxAVAkjY

One non-serious thing I enjoy doing in #rstats is making pixel art. I create a dataframe of the x and y coordinates, code the colors, then plot it with ggplot2. Here's a pacman ghost I made https://t.co/03RQvHfQbX

Gradient fill, pattern fill, masks, and clipping paths in the R graphics engine.
